articles.title: Review & setlist: John Legend was a legendary pro at MGM Fenway (and he knew it)
articles.description:
Legend hit the Boston stage with a sense of confidence, accomplishment, and maybe a bit of entitlement.

The post Review & setlist: John Legend was a legendary pro at MGM Fenway (and he knew it) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: John Legend performed at MGM Fenway, showcasing his confidence and talent on November 8, 2025.
The concert attracted a large audience, enhancing Boston's cultural scene and local economy.
Fans enjoyed a memorable setlist, reinforcing Boston's reputation as a key stop for major artists.
